name: Eidola
description:
Control two halves of one self in tandem through an action-adventure platformer where combat is key and life is money.

Mastering the mechanics and exploring the world are essencial to find resources, since consuming your valuable spoils is the only way to restore your energy, and the monsters of Eidola are always lurking.

Controls:

GamepadKeyboardActionLeft AnalogDirectional ArrowMove left and right, look up and down
AZJumpA (Air)Z (Air)Air Jump (Blue) or Air Dash (Orange)XXAttack (Mix it with a directional input for different attacks)X (Hold)X (Hold)Charged AttackYCHeal (Consume Pebbles)Right BumperAChange between charactersLeft BumperSMake the other character to stay in place or call it back to your

This is a demo, so any feedback is appreciated. We`ll be posting soon about the updates on the making so stay tuned for more information our Discord server or by following us on Twitter, Facebook, or Instagram
